name: nodejs-tests
description: Experiments with JavaScript / Erlang's Common Test boundaries

scripts.prettier: npm run prettier-src && npm run prettier-test && npm run prettier-rc && npm run prettier-mjs && npm run prettier-index && npm run prettier-package
scripts.eslint: npm run eslint-src && npm run eslint-test && npm run eslint-mjs && npm run eslint-index
scripts.format-lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.dist:
npm install && npm run format-lint && npm run test && echo "
Ready for submission!"
